name: brand_info
description: Aesthetic Instagram post template with centered CTA, extended background, and subtle gradients

samples.heading: Our Team Spirit
samples.subheading: We foster collaboration and innovation to build a thriving workplace culture.

fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality square background image (1080x1080) showcasing company culture, team collaboration, workplace environment, or professional bonding activities. Include specific details about lighting, setting, people, and atmosphere to convey a positive, inclusive company culture.
fieldPrompt.heading: Write a compelling, attention-grabbing headline (3-5 words) that represents your company's values or culture. Examples: Our Team Spirit, Innovation Lives Here, Building Together. Keep it concise and impactful.
fieldPrompt.subheading: Craft an engaging subheading (15-25 words) that describes your company culture, values, or what makes your workplace special. Focus on benefits to employees or company achievements. Be authentic and inspiring.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear call-to-action (2-4 words) that encourages engagement. Examples: Join Us, Learn More, Apply Today, Discover More. Make it action-oriented and relevant to your audience.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code that represents your brand identity (e.g., #FF5733 for orange, #4A90E2 for blue). Choose a color that aligns with your company's visual branding and the message you want to convey.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your company website URL (e.g., www.yourcompany.com). Include the full domain without http:// for a cleaner appearance.
